title: The Landlord
description: It was a far better room than she thought she would have been able to afford. But Hannah was a little nervous living in a house occupied solely by herself and the landlord. He was an older man, old enough to be her father -- if she'd had one. More troubling, for a young woman who had little exposure to men, he was so... masculine. Large, decisive, stern, handsome, he was an eye opener to young Hannah.And little by little he began to take over her life as she slowly fell in love with him. First he taught her about sex and pleasure and heat. Then he taught her about obedience and discipline and pain. He made her call him 'daddy' and turned her into his love slave. For Hannah, it was a wild, shockingly arousing, tumultuous sexual experience like none she'd ever had in her life. And it was only going to get more shocking...
author: J.J. Argus
